t: Exclusive: Chinese suppliers are offering U.S. Amazon sellers a tariff solution—but it’s not legal
s: April 12, 2025 - In emails and WeChat messages viewed by Fortune, Chinese suppliers proposed illegal workarounds to executives from a brand with a large presence on Amazon.

t: Amazon.com, Inc. (AMZN.SN) Company Profile & Facts - Yahoo Finance
s: Amazon.com, Inc. engages in the retail sale of consumer products, advertising, and subscriptions service through online and physical stores in North America and internationally. The company operates through three segments: North America, International, and Amazon Web Services (AWS).

t: Nike to start selling its products directly on Amazon's US website again
s: 4 days ago - Nike is reestablishing a more direct relationship with Amazon at a time when its sales are weakening. In March the Beaverton, Oregon, company reported that its third-quarter sales fell 9% to $11.27 billion as revenue declined for the Nike brand and Converse.
